meanings.sent1: She reexamined her homework to make sure she didn't miss any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He reexamined the map to find the correct route.
meanings.sent3: The detective reexamined the crime scene, looking for any missed clues.
meanings.sent4: After the argument, she reexamined her feelings towards her friend.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reexamined the data, hoping to discover a new pattern.

meanings.sent1: The student reexamined the textbook to prepare for the test.
meanings.sent2: He reexamined the contract before signing it.
meanings.sent3: The chef reexamined the recipe, trying to improve the taste.
meanings.sent4: She reexamined her decision, wondering if she made the right choice.
meanings.sent5: The historian reexamined the ancient artifact, searching for new insights.
